title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Adapted From Other Material
description: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

title: Jaws
description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

title: Barry Lyndon
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring Original Song Score and/or Adaptation
description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

title: Dog Day Afternoon
description: Three amateur bank robbers plan a simple heist. It goes horribly wrong, and the situation gradually escalates into a media circus and a hostage crisis.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
description: A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

title: Nashville
description: Over the course of a few days, multiple storylines overlap in Nashville, Tennessee, leading up to a gala concert for a populist political candidate.

title: The Man Who Would Be King
description: Two British former soldiers decide to set themselves up as Kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.

title: Three Days of the Condor
description: A mild-mannered CIA researcher finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

title: Picnic at Hanging Rock
description: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.

title: The Mirror
description: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell the story of the Russian nation.

title: Dersu Uzala
description: The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

title: Deep Red
description: A jazz pianist and a wisecracking journalist are pulled into a complex web of mystery after the former witnesses the brutal murder of a psychic.

title: Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom
description: In World War II Italy, four wealthy libertines kidnap eighteen teenagers and subject them to four months of extreme violence, sadism, and sexual torture.

title: Jeanne Dielman, 23, quai du Commerce, 1080 Bruxelles
description: A lonely widowed housewife does her daily chores, takes care of her apartment where she lives with her teenage son, and turns the occasional trick to make ends meet. However, something happens that changes her safe routine.

title: The Passenger
description: A frustrated war correspondent assumes the identity of a dead arms dealer in North Africa and embarks on a dangerous adventure across Europe.

title: Love and Death
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: In czarist Russia, a neurotic soldier and his distant cousin formulate a plot to assassinate Napoleon.

title: Sholay
description: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture him.

title: Grey Gardens
description: An old mother and her middle-aged daughter, the aunt and cousin of Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis, live their eccentric lives in a decaying mansion in East Hampton.

title: Hard Times
description: A drifter turns to bare-knuckle fighting to make some money in the Depression-era South.

title: Night Moves
description: A Los Angeles private investigator discovers a Hollywood stuntman's suspicious behavior while looking for a runaway teenager.

title: The Day of the Locust
description: A young artist finds only greed and despair in 1930s Hollywood.

title: Shampoo
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A hairdresser's confusing love life and his frantic business affairs on Election Day 1968.

title: The Sunshine Boys
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A vaudeville duo, who hate each other, are reunited for a television special.

title: The Wind and the Lion
description: An American woman and her children are kidnapped by a Berber chief, prompting a rescue mission.

title: The Return of the Pink Panther
description: Inspector Clouseau is called upon to investigate the theft of the Pink Panther diamond again.

title: Tommy
description: A psychosomatically deaf, dumb and blind boy becomes a master pinball player and the object of a religious cult.

title: Death Race 2000
description: In a dystopian future, a cross-country automobile race requires contestants to run down innocent pedestrians to gain points.

title: Rollerball
description: In a corporate-controlled future, an ultra-violent sport known as Rollerball represents the world, and one of its powerful athletes is out to defy those who want him out of the game.

title: French Connection II
description: Popeye Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.

title: Farewell, My Lovely
description: Los Angeles private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by an ex-con to find his former girlfriend.

title: The Story of Adèle H.
description: The daughter of Victor Hugo falls in love with a British soldier, but her obsessive love leads to self-destruction.

title: A Boy and His Dog
description: A young man and his telepathic dog wander through a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

title: The Stepford Wives
description: Joanna Eberhart has come to the quaint little town of Stepford, Connecticut with her family, but soon discovers there lies a sinister truth in the all too perfect behavior of the female residents.

title: Hester Street
description: A Jewish immigrant comes to New York's Lower East Side to find his wife, who has arrived from the old country, is not the woman he remembers.

title: Fox and His Friends
description: A working-class carnival worker wins the lottery, but finds himself exploited by his new bourgeois lover.

title: Mother Küsters Goes to Heaven
description: A woman's husband kills his boss and then himself, and she becomes the target of media exploitation.

title: The Travelling Players
description: A group of travelling players wanders through Greece performing a play, while the history of the country from 1939 to 1952 unfolds around them.

title: Xala
description: A corrupt businessman is cursed with impotence on his wedding night with his third wife.

title: Manila in the Claws of Light
description: A young fisherman from the province searches for his girlfriend in Manila, where he struggles to survive.

title: The Hiding Place
description: Corrie and Betsie ten Boom are middle-aged sisters working in their father's watchmaker shop in pre-WWII Holland. Their uneventful lives are disrupted with the coming of the Nazis.

title: The Great Waldo Pepper
description: A biplane pilot who missed flying in WWI takes up barnstorming and later a movie career in his quest for the glory he missed.

title: Bite the Bullet
description: A group of ex-rough riders, an ex-prostitute and a gunfighter enter a horse race in the desert.

title: The Eiger Sanction
description: A classical art professor and collector, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.

title: Race with the Devil
description: Two couples vacationing together in an RV from Texas to Colorado are terrorized by Satanists when they accidentally witness a ritual sacrifice.

title: Smile
description: A satirical look at a small-town beauty pageant and the people involved in it.

title: Funny Lady
description: A sequel to Funny Girl, centering on Fanny Brice's professional life and her marriage to songwriter Billy Rose.

title: The Apple Dumpling Gang
description: Three orphan children strike gold in 1878 California. They are entrusted to a gambler who must keep the money safe from greedy townspeople.

title: Escape to Witch Mountain
description: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

title: Shivers
description: The residents of a suburban high-rise apartment building are being infected by a strain of parasites that turn them into mindless, sex-crazed fiends out to infect others by the slightest sexual contact.

title: Switchblade Sisters
description: The leader of an inner-city girl gang is threatened when a new girl moves into town and challenges her authority.
